thread.title: Khloe Kardashian Strips Down For The Cover Of her Memoir
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian Strips Down For The Cover Of her Memoir

author: Stephanie Marcus
title: Khloe Kardashian Strips Down For The Cover Of her Memoir
text:
Email Khloe Kardashian Strips Down For The Cover Of her Memoir The star reportedly thanks Lamar Odom for some of the best years of her life and writes, "Before I met you, I felt invisible, and after I felt seen." Stephanie Marcus Entertainment Editor, Huffington Post Posted: 10/22/2015 09:43 AM EDT 
When your memoir is called Strong Looks Better Naked , it's only fitting that you would strip down for the book jacket. And if you were a Kardashian, that book jacket would fold out into a full-size poster. 
Khloe Kardashian's book doesn't hit stores until Nov. 3, but the subject matter is well-timed, since she's called off her divorce from Lamar Odom and is giving their relationship another chance. Simon and Schuster 
While Kardashian bares her body on the cover, inside the pages she shares "secrets for finding strength of body, mind and heart with revelatory stories of her own struggles with weight, relationships and her self-image," according to the book's publisher. 
The 31-year-old star reportedly opens up about her relationship with Odom and writes, "Before I met you, I felt invisible, and after I felt seen." Sources who have read the book told Page Six that Kardashian writes of the time leading up to their split when she was hounded by paparazzi asking, "Is it true Lamar cheated on you?” and “Is he doing drugs?” 
Kardashian explains in the book, which takes on a self-help tone: "The thing is, you can’t control other people, and you can’t control the outcome of situations, and if you think you can, you will soon discover that you are sadly mistaken.” 
Also on HuffPost: The Raciest Nude Magazine Covers Ever [NSFW] of
